title: PhD Positions in In-Memory Computing
description: We are looking for motivated PhD students to work on next-generation in-memory computing architectures. Ideal candidates should have a strong background in computer architecture, digital design, or machine learning.
requirements: MS or equivalent in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field
Strong programming skills in Python and C/C++

title: PhD Positions in RISC-V Architecture
description: Openings for PhD students interested in custom RISC-V processor design, including security extensions and domain-specific accelerators.
requirements: MS or equivalent in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering
Experience with processor design and verification
Familiarity with RISC-V ISA is a plus

title: Summer Research Internship 2026
description: 10-12 week summer research internship for undergraduate and MS students. Work on cutting-edge research projects in computer architecture and AI systems.
requirements: Currently enrolled in BS or MS program
Background in computer architecture or machine learning
Available for full-time research during summer

title: Research Collaborations
description: We welcome research collaborations with academic institutions and industry partners. Areas of interest include in-memory computing, RISC-V, and AI hardware.
